title: Here's a medley of the most cringetastic liberals pandering on the Communist China run TikTok
description:
During the course of the 2022 election cycle, many a leftist took to the Communist China owned social media app TikTok to pander to the youths. TikTok is called by critics "worthless to society" and if you read the terms of service, China owns all of your data. If you choose to use it anyway, that's on you. But it's odd that elected American officials would encourage usage of an app that sends all your personal data to Communist China.

What is also unclear is why all Democrat TikToks need to reach ungodly levels of cringe. It's as if you have to take a cringe test before making a political video, and if you don't score at least 85% in cringe the app disables itself. Citizen journalist Libs of TikTok compiled the cringiest of the cringe. Either there is a hidden zoomer vote we're about to be surprised within the next few hours, or you all need to be ashamed of yourselves.

CRINGE COMPILATION!

All the politicians and activists who took to TikTok to appeal for votes:

Watch till end! pic.twitter.com/C3MfPwUoFc
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) November 8, 2022

Karine Jean Pierre was asked about the White House's excessive use of TikTok influencers using Communist China run app (that collects all our data for China) to help promote the president's message. KJP answered as KJP does.

Karine Jean-Pierre: "We understand the issues that TikTok presents itself with." pic.twitter.com/EtNYIdOMw6
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial) November 7, 2022
We understand the issues, but YOLO!

Do you know where you WON'T see TikToks? On Crowder's 2022 Midterm Election Livestream. We finally got our account banned.

Editor’s Note

title: 'F*** that': Ozzy Osbourne, realizing how much the UK sucks, decides he doesn't want to leave America after all
description:
Great news, metalheads. Ozzy Osbourne doesn't hate America after all. He is still moving back to the UK, but he's not happy about it.

Ozzy said back in August he was getting out of America, saying "everything’s f*cking ridiculous" here, citing all the people getting killed. "I don’t want to die in America. I’m English. I want to be back."

Osbourne appears to have realized how much the UK sucks ass. He says in a new interview that moving back is not his idea.

To be honest with you, if I had my way, I’d stay in America. I’m American now... to be honest with you, I don’t want to go back. F*ck that.

But he and his wife Sharon Osbourne have "both" decided that it is the right choice for "them." "They" both insist they need to make the move after Sharon got canceled for defending Piers Morgan after he made fun of Meghan Markle. It's too ridiculous a story to get into. At the end of the day, Ozzy's wife is making him move.

Also, as was revealed in Consequence, it's not all of America that is too violent. It is only Los Angeles. The couple has lived in LA for forty years. But as Sharon says, California is not what it once was.

It’s not that hub anymore. It’s not exciting anymore. It hasn’t gone sideways, it’s gone down. It’s not a fun place to live. It’s dangerous here. Every big city’s got crime, but I don’t feel safe here. Neither does Ozzy.

It would be unfair to hold that against them. Los Angeles has gotten too violent for Ice T and Snoop Dogg as well.

Wherever life brings Ozzy from here, to be frank... I try my best to not think of any he's done since the mid-nineties. As an old-school metalhead, I want to remember him as the "Prince of Darkness." One MTV reality show and an entire generation of metalheads were robbed of being able to do so.

title: Weird Al makes a joke about Elon Musk "banning" parodies on Twitter, users dare to be stupid about it
description:
We at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website are not ones for hyperbole, but this may be the greatest thing we've ever seen on Twitter. It involves Weird Al Yankovic, the poet laureate of America. There is a dash of Elon Musk. And you wrap it in the outrage over parodies now being banned on Twitter unless they are clearly marked parodies.

Yankovic made the announcement that actor Daniel Radcliffe, fresh off of throwing JK Rowling under the bus again, got himself SUSPENDED from Twitter.

Oh no, they suspended @danielradcliffe's Twitter account! Wasn't it obvious he was doing a PARODY???
— Al Yankovic (@alyankovic) November 7, 2022
Oh no, they suspended @danielradcliffe's Twitter account! Wasn't it obvious he was doing a PARODY???

Many of you reading this have a sense of humor and know where this is going. I ask that you please keep it to yourself until the end.

Upon hearing that Harry Potter was suspended from Twitter for a -- parody -- users were sent into a frenzy.

So is he
— Quone (@CraigABryan1) November 7, 2022


Comedy is dead on twitter.
— Fil OMEN a (@filamena) November 7, 2022

Some assumed it was political.

Anyone able to tell me what Radicliffe said to get banned? Asked cuz I love him and also respect that he doesn't often weigh in on big social issues but I'd love it if he did.
— Ratticus Binch 🐀 (@Teja2faze) November 7, 2022

It's serious. That fascist Elon Musk went too far.

I'm starting to get the weird feeling that fascists are running this site.
— Baron Brady (@BradyBaron) November 7, 2022


pic.twitter.com/Ho5My2FAN7
— Rabbitt (@TexasRabbitt) November 7, 2022

In all the outrage, there are a few factoids that are being left out.

That isn't Radcliffe's Twitter account. Radcliffe isn't on social media.

Radcliffe is currently starring in the biopic Weird: The Al Yankovic Story.

Weird: The Al Yankovic Story is a PARODY of a biopic about the life of Weird Al Yankovic, an artist known for his song PARODIES.

It's not that comedy is dead on Twitter. It's that some of you missed an obvious and brilliant joke, made more brilliant by you missing the obviousness of it.

Well played, Alfred. Well played.

Editor’s Note

title: White House lashes out at voters with one last angry tweet before America goes to vote
description:
He might be having a rough week, so I'll cut Joe Biden some slack. I am 99.86% sure he did not write or dictate his tweet. I am 99.86% sure Joe Biden doesn't know what a Twitter is. But someone at the White House press office thought THIS was a good message to put out onto the internet twelve hours before America starts voting.

You don’t get to accept hundreds of thousands of dollars in pandemic loans and then attack my Administration for helping working folks get some relief.
— President Biden (@POTUS) November 7, 2022
You don’t get to accept hundreds of thousands of dollars in pandemic loans and then attack my Administration for helping working folks get some relief.

I'm not even sure what they're talking about. I'm GUESSING it's about student loans because this White House thinks "derpity derp...you took out a PPP loan" is a dunk. That somehow shaming people who accepted PPP in order to not lay off employees after the government shut their businesses down would dismiss criticism of the upper-middle-class elites who took out unaffordable loans.

Which, again, CNTL+ALT+People who support student loans bailouts are people who demand the government bailout THEIR bad decisions. People who accepted PPP needed the loan to keep their employees able to provide for their families due to the GOVERNMENT'S bad decisions.

But the bit about telling any American what they can and can't criticize the administration for?

That's not how America works, Hoss. I can criticize you for anything I feel like. Bonus points if it's when the White House spreads misinformation assuming their fluffers in the media won't call them out. But no administration and/or regime gets to lecture Americans on how we choose to disagree with that administration and/or regime.

It explains so much going into America voting today that this White House doesn't grasp that.

title: Mark Ruffalo tries playing superhero for AOC, but Elon Musk is the one who goes Hulk Smash
description:
It's hard to keep up with all the GLORIOUS chaos Elon Musk is creating on Twitter. Elon endorsing voting for all Republicans during the midterms yesterday set a gold standard. We missed this a few days ago with Mark Ruffalo, who is a choad. Of all the dumb actors with obnoxious political opinions, Ruffalo ranks in the top five. He tried caping for social media influencer Rep. AOC in her one-sided feud against Elon Musk, but Musk was the one who said "puny human."

To recap, Elon announced he would let anyone get verified with a blue checkmark for $8 a month.

pic.twitter.com/3t5ahItE5z
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) November 8, 2022

Social media influencer Rep. AOC got emotional over normies having the same status as she did. She also didn't realize the "free" in "free speech" stands for "freedom" and not money. Odd, since the social media influencer has a side hustle as a member of Congress. Elon responded and made her look stupid. Rep. AOC claimed without evidence that her Twitter account was broken as a result.

Here comes Ruffalo to rescue, kinda.

Elon. Please—for the love of decency—get off Twitter, hand the keys over to someone who does this as an actual job, and get on with running Tesla and SpaceX. You are destroying your credibility. It’s just not a good look. https://t.co/34aMtU5h62
— Mark Ruffalo (@MarkRuffalo) November 4, 2022

Three issues with Ruffalo derping in 280 characters or less. 1. Elon Musk "destroyed his credibility" the minute he expressed a single viewpoint that elitist progressives disagreed with, and it started during the pandemic. 2. The only ones who think it's "not a good look" are those same elitist progressives Musk now knows were never his friends. 3. Rep. AOC is a drama queen who lies a lot.

ELON SMASH!

Hot take: not everything AOC says is 💯 accurate
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) November 5, 2022

Ruffalo went on about "robust filters for dis/misinformation & credible verified users" as defined by his political worldview. And I agree, kinda. Twitter's "Birdwatch" system (or "Community Notes") where users are fact-checking the misinformation spread by the left should be more robust.

Think about the first time Birdwatch/Community Notes fact-checks social media influencer Rep. AOC. Her meltdown will be glorious and she will never calm down about it.

Editor’s Note

title: Mario Lopez shares pro-GOP voting message and based bros are coming to his defense against the leftist haters
description:
Mario Lopez might have some right-leaning tendencies. He can't be full-blown conservative if he wants to stay employable in Hollywood. Every so often, Lopez lets it slip. Either that, or he just enjoys having fun on Twitter like we saw with the actor entering the Latinx debate.

Our latest peak at Mario's political leanings comes from him sharing a meme: "Before you go vote: Go grocery shopping, gas up your car, pal your bills, look at your 401k. Then vote."

pic.twitter.com/BoUT1yRz11
— Mario Lopez (@mariolopezviva) November 7, 2022

It's a common message shared by voters who plan on electing Republicans today to start undoing the mess Joe Biden has made of this country. The Democrat version of this meme would be "Before you vote: Go get an abortion. Then vote."

Mario Lopez, an actor, shared a not-leftist political opinion. This is the part where a content hustler like myself goes through the replies looking for three people attacking him. Journalisming standards are three people with the same dumb opinion equals a news article. But as I was curating tweets, I found myself much more entertained by people defending Lopez against the haters.

After all, AC Slater is the original based bro.

Probably cuz you'll try to cancel him if he does
— travis peters (@travispeters9) November 8, 2022


And be thankful she has the right to life?
— Danny Able (@DK_Able) November 8, 2022


are you sure your daughter is not a son?
— AltCentrist (@AltCentristNorm) November 8, 2022

These two are my favorites.

The neighborhoods that have been voting for Democrats since the 1960s but still look like Mogadishu?
— Sekrah Sports (@sekrah) November 8, 2022


The book is probably more expensive now than it was two years ago
— DR (@r82507745) November 8, 2022

What really stands out to me? This is not the first time I've trolled Twitter replies for leftist haters. It IS the first time I've done so and there were equal parts of haters and supporters. It's also the first time a lot of the haters had a response attached to it that was visible on the timeline without having to click around.

It's almost as if Twitter changed the way it is doing things. But I can't quite put my finger on what.

title: Watch: Girl in Joe Biden bra says she isn't educated enough about issues but 'just really loves boobies'
description:
Joe Biden was forced to campaign in New York over the weekend due to crime-denier Gov. Kathy Hochul being at risk of losing her election. Yes, in New York. He gave a rally. It was the usual schtick. Biden announced no new oil drilling, leaving the White House to again walk something back and claim he didn't say what we heard him say. He butchered the English language. He almost fell down again. And Kathy Hochul said Democrats are bad a messaging.

But the star of the show was a student who got the attention of a reporter. She pulled the top of her dress down to reveal her homemade Joe Biden bra, with the "o" in "Joe" in the shape of a heart. Then things got weird.

Sarah Lawrence College student with “Joe Biden” sharpied on her bra ahead of his rally

“I don’t even like Joe Biden that much…” pic.twitter.com/9f5t2aY5bt
— Timcast News (@TimcastNews) November 7, 2022
I mean I sort of feel like all presidents kind of can’t really do good, like that good things, but also I’m not educated enough on the topic...I just really love fashion and boobies and Joe Biden-related merchandise, and attention, and I love taking my clothes off, so that’s all I have to say.

In under twenty-four hours, this video has already amassed over 42,000 views on Twitter! I don't have to tell you what THAT means...

She then professed her sexual attraction to Joe Biden (even though she is way out of his preferred age range). She doesn't want to make Joe or his wife Jill uncomfortable. You know, what with them being married and her showing off a homemade Joe Biden bra. However, "I am really into him as a person and I think that we would be really compatible, romantically, sexually."

If I were to find out that I fell for a troll job, God love ya. This student could be doing her senior thesis on how easy it is to go viral on the political end of the internet. She's testing different topics. This video is part of the "chesticles and a sexual attraction to Joe Biden" section. And I'm helping prove her hypothesis. If that is the case, we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website are happy to help in her academic endeavors.

Or she's a crazy lady. And there isn't much else going on on this huge raging Election Day until they start counting votes. Either way... boobs.
